bibl.title: If the Face Fits ... A Comparison of Mummies and their Accompanying Portraits Using Computerised Axial Tomography.
bibl.note: Radiological examination of eight mummies, mostly from the Roman period, currently housed in the Department of Egyptian Antiquities at the British Museum.

bibl.title: Portraits and Masks. Burial Customs in Roman Egypt

bibl.seg: FILER Joyce M., If the Face Fits ... A Comparison of Mummies and their Accompanying Portraits Using Computerised Axial Tomography.
Morris L. BIERBRIER (Ed.), Portraits and Masks. Burial Customs in Roman Egypt (London, 1997) pp. 121-126 et pll. 16, 1 et 44-46.
Radiological examination of eight mummies, mostly from the Roman period, currently housed in the Department of Egyptian Antiquities at the British Museum.
